article:
The Shanghai Metro is a rapid transit system serving Shanghai, China, and it is
one of the fastest-growing metro systems in the world. The first section opened
in 1993, and the system as of 2013 has of track in operation, making
it one of the longest metro system in the world.

The table below contains the '251 stations' . which are open as of
July 2013, counting interchange stations as a single station, and not including
stations on the Shanghai Maglev Train line and Jinshan Railway.
categories: Lists of railway stations in China
